title: Getting Dressed in the 18th Century - Chemise Gown (1780s)

media:group.media:title: Getting Dressed in the 18th Century - Chemise Gown (1780s)
media:group.media:description:
A woman gets dressed in an 18th Century 'Chemise a la Reine' style gown.

Visit this website to learn about and support a project to research and recreate muslin fabrics: http://bengalmuslin.com/

Cast:
Woman - Kate Baker-Loven
Maid - Pauline Loven

Director: Nicole Loven
Costumier: Pauline Loven
Hair: Anita Cudbertson
Voice-over: Nicole Loven

Music: Una Nueva Alba - Patrick Ussher
